Riverhouse

A new wave of office and retail space in Belfast City Centre's Cathedral Quarter. Launching Q2 2018.

Launching
Q2 2018

The best location makes for the best amenities, River House Yard is just a minute’s walk from the famous Merchant Hotel and Belfast’s best bars, cafes and restaurants. Entertaining clients, socialising with staff will never be easier or more convenient. It also neighbours the best gyms, and Victoria Square.
